result.arabic_text: وَمَا مِنَّآ إِلَّا لَهُۥ مَقَامٞ مَّعۡلُومٞ
result.translation: (164) [The angels say],[1310] "There is not among us any except that he has a known position.[1311]
result.footnotes:
[1310]- Refuting what the disbelievers had said about them.
[1311]- For worship.  Or "an assigned task" to perform.
